snippet: The Yurok Tribe’s extensive campaign to revive the language serves as a model to the many other tribes that are undertaking similar efforts, experts say.
abstract: Eureka High School is one of four public schools in Northern California where Yurok language is taught; experts say Yurok Tribe’s extensive campaign to revive the language serves as model to many other tribes that are undertaking similar efforts to reclaim indigenous tongues.
lead_paragraph: The Yurok Tribe’s extensive campaign to revive the language serves as a model to the many other tribes that are undertaking similar efforts, experts say.

headline.main: In California, Saving a Language That Predates Spanish and English
headline.print_headline: In California, Saving a Language That Predates Spanish and English
